title: Temporal Cloud - Overview
description: This dashboard provides insights into system health, performance and workflow efficiency for your Temporal Cloud instance.

definition.content:
**[Temporal Cloud](https://temporal.io/cloud)** streamlines scalable application development by orchestrating workflows, retries, and state management.

This dashboard provides insights into system health, performance and workflow efficiency for your Temporal Cloud instance.

For more information, see the [Temporal Cloud Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/temporal_cloud/).

**Tip**:
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.
